  <style>
  img {
    padding: 10px;
  }
  div {
    color: red;
    font-size: 24px;
  }
  </style>

</head>
<body>
 
  <input type="checkbox" checked="checked">
  <input type="checkbox">
  <input type="checkbox">
  <input type="checkbox" checked="checked">
 
<script>
$( "input[type='checkbox']" ).prop({
  disabled: true
});
</script>
 
</body>
</html>

JQ Auto-resize text-area field
children.value:
<script>
<textarea id="form-field-BERICHT"></textarea>

var textarea = document.getElementById("form-field-BERICHT");
var expandedHeight = 500;
textarea.addEventListener("focus", function() {
  textarea.style.height = expandedHeight + "px";
});
textarea.addEventListener("blur", function() {
  expandedHeight = textarea.clientHeight;
  textarea.style.height = "";
});
textarea.addEventListener("input", function() {
  textarea.style.height = "";
  var newHeight = textarea.scrollHeight + 1;
  textarea.style.height = newHeight + "px";
});
</script>

children.label: JQ Auto-resize text-area field

<script>
<textarea id="form-field-BERICHT"></textarea>

var textarea = document.getElementById("form-field-BERICHT");
var expandedHeight = 500;
textarea.addEventListener("focus", function() {
  textarea.style.height = expandedHeight + "px";
});
textarea.addEventListener("blur", function() {
  expandedHeight = textarea.clientHeight;
  textarea.style.height = "";
});
textarea.addEventListener("input", function() {
  textarea.style.height = "";
  var newHeight = textarea.scrollHeight + 1;
  textarea.style.height = newHeight + "px";
});
</script>

children.label: Default WP Locations
Namespace & functie calls
children.value:
<?php

//_____________
// my namespace
namespace pampus;


function function_1() {
  // example function
}

//____
// calling external function in another namespace
$external_namespaces_function = \another_namespace\function_2();


//____
// If you are importing a class, you don't have to type "use class", just "use".
use function \another_namespace\function_2;
use function \another_namespace\function_2 as function_3;

// Now we can use that function directly
$external_namespaces_function = function_2();
$external_namespaces_function = function_3();

// But I want to call my own function with the same name!
$my_function = \pampus\function_1();


//____
// calling a function that is defined in *another file* under the namespace pampus.
$users = function_1(); 

// This is fine if we don't have a function with the same name under our namespace.
$post_id = wp_insert_post($var); 


//____
// calling a function from the global space.
$post_id = \wp_insert_post($var);




//______________
// new namespace
namespace another_namespace;

// function under new namespace
function function_2() {
  // example function
}

JQ Dialog styling Information
children.value:
If the draggable option is set, the ui-dialog-dragging class is added during a drag. 
If the resizable option is set, the ui-dialog-resizing class is added during a resize. 
If the buttons option is set, the ui-dialog-buttons class is added.

ui-dialog-titlebar: The title bar containing the dialog's title and close button.
ui-dialog-title: The container around the textual title of the dialog.
ui-dialog-titlebar-close: The dialog's close button.
ui-dialog-content: The container around the dialog's content. This is also the element the widget was instantiated with.
ui-dialog-buttonpane: The pane that contains the dialog's buttons. This will only be present if the buttons option is set.
ui-dialog-buttonset: The container around the buttons themselves.

Additionally, when the modal option is set, an element with a ui-widget-overlay class name is appended to the <body>

children.label: JQ Input Up en Down buttons script
children.value:
jQuery(".field").each(function(){
        var i=jQuery(this),                           // i = dit jQuery object                    // vindt de elementen en maak een object
          n=i.find('input[type="number"]'),           // n = input veld
          a=i.find(".field-up"),                      // a = up button
          e=i.find(".field-down"),                    // e = down button
          r=n.attr("min"),                            // r = min waarde
          t=n.attr("max");                            // t = max waarde

        a.click(function(){                           // luister naar klik "up button"            // check waarde van up button en pas 
        var a=parseFloat(n.val());                    // als klik, "a" = input veld waarde        // daarna die waarde to op input veld
          if(a>=t)var e=a;                            // als "a" >= max, dan "e" = "a"
          else var e=a+1;                             // zo niet, dan: "e" = input-waarde +1 
        i.find("input").val(e),                       // Zoek input, zet waarde op "e"
        i.find("input").trigger("change");            // trigger change ("val" = geen trigger)
        }),

        e.click(function(){                           // luister naar click "down button"          // check waarde van down button en pas 
        var a=parseFloat(n.val());                    // als klik, "a" = input veld waarde         // daarna die waarde to op input veld
          if(r>=a)var e=a;                            // als "a" <= min, dan "e" = "a"
          else var e=a-1;                             // zo niet, dan: "e" = input-waarde -1 
        i.find("input").val(e),                       // Zoek input, zet waarde op "e"
        i.find("input").trigger("change");            // trigger change ("val" = trigger)
        })
      });

children.label: CSS Number field style
CSS Numbers field minified
children.value: input[type=number]::-webkit-inner-spin-button, input[type=number]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {-webkit-appearance: none;margin: 0;}input[type=number] {-moz-appearance: textfield;appearance: textfield;}.field input {outline: 0;border: none;width: 42px;height: 32px;line-height: 1.65;padding: 0;margin: 0;padding-left: 0px;border: 1px solid red;}.field input:focus {outline: 0;}.field-nav {height: 32px;}.field-button {position: relative;cursor: default;border-left: 1px solid #ccc;width: 14px;text-align: center;color: #333;font-size: 13px;font-family: "Trebuchet MS", Helvetica, sans-serif !important;line-height: 1.7;-webkit-transform: translateX(-100%);transform: translateX(-100%);-webkit-user-select: none;-moz-user-select: none;-ms-user-select: none;-o-user-select: none;user-select: none;}.field-button.field-up {position: absolute;height: 50%;top: 0;border-bottom: 1px solid #eee;}.field-button.field-down {position: absolute;bottom: -1px;height: 50%;}

children.label: CSS Range slider style
CSS Range slider minified
children.value: .slider {margin: 0 0 0 0;}input[type=range] {height: 12px;-webkit-appearance: none;appearance: none;margin: 5px 0 3px 0;width: 100%;}input[type=range]:focus {outline: none;}input[type=range]:focus::-webkit-slider-runnable-track {background: #31669c;}input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-runnable-track {width: 100%;height: 5px;cursor: pointer;transition: 0.2s;box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #12505cbd;background: #31669c;border-radius: 7px;border: 1px solid #010101;}input[type=range]::-moz-range-track {width: 100%;height: 5px;cursor: pointer;transition: 0.2s;box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #12505Cbd;background: #31669c;border-radius: 7px;border: 1px solid #010101;}input[type=range]::-ms-track {width: 100%;height: 5px;cursor: pointer;transition: 0.2s;background: transparent;border-color: transparent;color: transparent;}input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-thumb {box-shadow: 1px 1px 4px #555C70bd;border: 2px solid #3B6987;height: 12px;width: 12px;border-radius: 5px;background: #F2F2F2;cursor: pointer;-webkit-appearance: none;margin-top: -4.5px;}input[type=range]::-moz-range-thumb {box-shadow: 1px 1px 4px #555C70bd;border: 2px solid #3B6987;height: 12px;width: 12px;border-radius: 5px;background: #F2F2F2;cursor: pointer;}input[type=range]::-ms-thumb {margin-top: 1px;box-shadow: 1px 1px 4px #555C70bd;border: 2px solid #3B6987;height: 12px;width: 12px;border-radius: 5px;background: #F2F2F2;cursor: pointer;}input[type=range]::-ms-fill-lower {background: #31669c;border: 1px solid #010101;border-radius: 12px;box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #12505Cbd;}input[type=range]::-ms-fill-upper {background: #31669c;border: 1px solid #010101;border-radius: 12px;box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px #12505Cbd;}input[type=range]:focus::-ms-fill-lower {background: #31669c;}input[type=range]:focus::-ms-fill-upper {background: #31669c;}.disabled {background: transparent!important;pointer-events: none!important;opacity:0.4;cursor: none;}.disabled input[type=range]:focus::-webkit-slider-runnable-track {background: transparent!important;pointer-events: none!important;opacity:0.4;}.disabled input[type=range]::-webkit-slider-runnable-track {width: 100%;height: 5px;cursor: none;box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px transparent!important;background: transparent!important;border-radius: 7px;border: 1px solid transparent!important;pointer-events: none;opacity:0.4;}.disabled input[type=range]::-moz-range-track {width: 100%;height: 5px;cursor: none;box-shadow: 1px 1px 3px transparent!important;background: transparent!important;border-radius: 7px;border: none!important;pointer-events: none;opacity:0.4;}

children.label: CSS radiobuttons style
CSS radiobuttons minified
children.value: :root {-form-control-color: #800080;}*, *:before, *:after {box-sizing: border-box;}.form-control {display: grid;grid-template-columns: .9em auto;gap: 0.6em;}.form-control:focus-within {color: #064b91;}input[type=radio] {background-color: #fff;margin: 0 3px;max-width:16px!important;max-height: 16px!important;min-width: 16px!important;min-height: 16px!important;border: 1px solid #064b91;border-radius: 50%;color: #064b91;vertical-align:bottom!important;}input[type="radio"]:checked {outline: max(.006em,.006em) solid #064b91!important;}input[type="radio"]::before {box-shadow: inset .15em .15em 0 #064b91!important;content: "";border-radius: 50%;}input[type="radio"]:checked::before {transform: scale(1.03);}

children.label: CSS  checkbox  style
CSS checkbox minified
children.value: .checkbox-wrapper-4 * {box-sizing: border-box;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx {-webkit-user-select: none;user-select: none;cursor: pointer;padding: 5px 0 ;border-radius: 3px;overflow: hidden;transition: all 0.3s ease;display: inline-block;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx:not(:last-child) {margin-right: 5px;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx:hover {background: #0077ff07;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx span {float: left;vertical-align: middle;transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx span:first-child {position: relative;width: 17px;height: 16px;border-radius: 3px;transform: scale(1);border: 1px solid #454757;transition: all 0.3 ease;box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px #00104b22;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx span:first-child svg {position: absolute;top: 2px;left: 2px;fill: none;stroke: #fff;stroke-width: 2;stroke-linecap: round;stroke-linejoin: round;stroke-dasharray: 14px;stroke-dashoffset: 14px;transition: all 0.2s ease;transition-delay: 0.0s;transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx span:last-child {padding-left: 6px;line-height: 16px;padding-top:1px;font-weight: 500;font-size: 0.95rem;font-family: "Comfortaa", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif Helvetica;color: #333;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx:hover span:first-child {border-color: #105091;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .inp-cbx {position: absolute;visibility: hidden;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .inp-cbx:checked+.cbx span:first-child {background: #2774b3;border-color: #105091;animation: wave-4 0.3s ease;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .inp-cbx:checked+.cbx span:first-child svg {stroke-dashoffset: 0;}.checkbox-wrapper-4 .inline-svg {position: absolute;width: 0;height: 0;pointer-events: none;user-select: none;}@media screen and (max-width: 640px){.checkbox-wrapper-4 .cbx {width: 100%;display: inline-block;}}@-moz-keyframes wave-4 {50% {transform: scale(0.85);}}@-webkit-keyframes wave-4 {50% {transform: scale(0.85);}}@-o-keyframes wave-4 {50% {transform: scale(0.85);}}@keyframes wave-4 {50% {transform: scale(0.85);}}.chebo_1 {color:#2774b3;}

children.label: CSS Toggle switch 1 minified
children.value: .form-switch i {position: relative;display: inline-block;margin-right: .5rem;width: 46px;height: 26px;background-color: #e6e6e6;border-radius: 23px;vertical-align: text-bottom;transition: all 0.3s linear;}.form-switch i::before {content: "";position: absolute;left: 0;width: 42px;height: 22px;background-color: #fff;border-radius: 11px;transform: translate3d(2px, 2px, 0) scale3d(1, 1, 1);transition: all 0.25s linear;}.form-switch i::after {content: "";position: absolute;left: 0;width: 22px;height: 22px;background-color: #fff;border-radius: 11px;box-shadow: 0 2px 2px #18181825;transform: translate3d(2px, 2px, 0);transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;}.form-switch:active i::after {width: 28px;transform: translate3d(2px, 2px, 0);}.form-switch:active input:checked + i::after {transform: translate3d(16px, 2px, 0);}.form-switch input {display: none;}.form-switch input:checked + i {background-color: #0745a1;}.form-switch input:checked + i::before {transform: translate3d(18px, 2px, 0) scale3d(0, 0, 0);}.form-switch input:checked + i::after {transform: translate3d(22px, 2px, 0);}

children.label: AJAX met eventlisteners 1
children.value:
<script type="text/javascript">
      $(document).ready(function() {
        let inputFields1 = document.querySelectorAll(".numbers");
        inputFields1.forEach(function(inputField) {
          inputField.addEventListener("input", function() {
            if (inputField.value.length >= 5) {

                  $.ajax({
                  type: 'POST',
                  url: 'process.php',
                  data: formData,
                  success: function(response) {

                    $('#row1').html(response);

                  }
                });

            }
          });
        });
